input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPOMActor

items The items XML that will be used to Create Message.
Sample: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- XML Sample of Create Message <items> <item> <username>user</username> <password>pass</password> <arguments> <title>Test Message Created using the Adapter</title> <dns-name>s-14686.synapse.com</dns-name> <description>Test_Message_Description</description> <severity>critical</severity> <solution>Test_Solution</solution> <category>Test_Category</category> <sub-category>test_sub_category</sub-category> <product-type>test_ProductType</product-type> <problem-type>test_ProblemType</problem-type> <collaboration-mode>peer</collaboration-mode> <type>message_type</type> <application>My custom app</application> <object>Test_Object</object> <correlation-key>test key</correlation-key> <creation-time>2009-08-26T05:10:00</creation-time> <custom-attributes> <custom-attribute> <key>custom_Attribute_1</key> <text>value_1</text> </custom-attribute> </custom-attributes> </arguments> </item> </items>
username[Optional] This username overrides the value specified in the config. password[Optional] This password overrides the value specified in the config.
arguments[Required] This is a list of arguments that is required for this operation
title[Required] Specifies the message Title (also refered as message Text).
dns-name[Required] Specifies the DnsName (Node Name) of the message.
description[Optional] Specifies the description of the message.
severity[Optional] Severity of the message. Possible values could be as follows :- - Normal - Warning - Minor - Major - Critical - Unknown
solution[Optional] Specifies the solution attribute of the message.
category[Optional] Specifies the category (Message Group) of the message.
sub-category[Optional] Specifies the SubCategory of the message.
product-type[Optional] Specifies the ProductType attribute of the message.
problem-type[Optional] Specifies the ProblemType attribute of the message.
collaboration-mode[Optional] Specifies the CollaborationMode attribute of the message. Possible values could be as follows :- - fyi (default) - peer - incident_exchange
type[Optional] Specifies the message type attribute of the message.
application[Optional] Specifies Application of the message.
object[Optional] Specifies Object of the message.
correlation-key[Optional] Specifies the correlation key of the message.
create-time[Optional] Specifies the create time of the message.
Note : Create Time should follow the following Format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS
custom-attributes[Optional] Specifies the custom attribute of the message.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
